trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The BuildEventArgs class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> event argument classes.
trans-unit.target: BuildEventArgs 클래스는 모두에 대 한 추상 기본 클래스 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>이벤트 인수 클래스입니다.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class.

This implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> constructor takes no parameters, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A> property to <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> and the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> property to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs>생성자 매개 변수를 설정 하 고는 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A>속성을 <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>및 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A>속성을 현재 스레드에.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword*>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*> values.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"> </xref> 지정된 된 <> </> *>, <> </> *>, 및 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*>값.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*>

trans-unit.source: The text of the event.
The Help keyword associated with the event.
The source of the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs"></xref> class.
The text of the event.
The Help keyword associated with the event.
The source of the event.
The date and time to associate with the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트와 연결 하려면 날짜 및 시간입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets location contextual information.
trans-unit.target: 위치 컨텍스트 정보를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는 프로세스, 엔진, 프로젝트, 대상 또는 실행 중인 작업을 기준으로 정의를 기록에 연결 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"></xref> object representing the location contextual information.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventContext"> </xref> 위치 컨텍스트 정보를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Help keyword for the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트에 대 한 도움말 키워드를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword for the event.
Gets the message for the event.
The message for the event.
Gets the name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
The name of the <xref:System.Object> raising the event.
Gets an integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 하는 스레드에 대 한 정수 식별자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An integer identifier for the thread that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생 하는 스레드에 대 한 정수 식별자입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
The time the event was raised as a <xref:System.DateTime>.
